meanings.sent1: The hike was only a few klicks away.
meanings.sent2: The sign said the next town was ten klicks down the road.
meanings.sent3: I can't believe we have to walk so many klicks just to get to the store!
meanings.sent4: The klicks stretched out before us like an endless ribbon of distance.
meanings.sent5: The klicks on the map seemed to multiply as we traveled.

meanings.sent1: The soldiers had to march twenty klicks to reach their destination.
meanings.sent2: The commander ordered the troops to advance two klicks north.
meanings.sent3: The sergeant joked that he could run ten klicks in his sleep.
meanings.sent4: The enemy base was just a few klicks away, within striking distance.
meanings.sent5: The military operation covered many klicks of rough terrain.

meanings.sent1: The biker said he rode a couple of klicks to get to the party.
meanings.sent2: The truck driver mentioned he had to drive fifty klicks to make the delivery.
meanings.sent3: She bragged about how her new car could eat up the klicks on the highway.
meanings.sent4: The old pickup truck had seen better days, but it still had a few klicks left in it.
meanings.sent5: The marathon runner had trained for months to conquer the final klicks of the race.
